dict.acceptation: 使确信；符合，达到（要求、规定、标准等）；消除；履行；

sent.orig: It is impossible to satisfy all demands.
The education system must satisfy the needs of all children.
sent.trans: 教育系统必须满足所有儿童的需要。

sent.orig: At present, no other source of energy can satisfy its needs.
sent.trans: 目前，还没有其他能源能满足她的需求。

sent.orig: Efficiency, and reliability are the decisive factors to satisfy the pluralized development of IT industry.
sent.trans: 效率，安全和可靠性已成为满足多元化IT工业发展的决定性因素。

sent.orig: A: Is this going to satisfy your requirements?
